Burma/Myanmar is a country with many problems, including persecution of muslims. From what I've read of the interview the journalist only wanted to talk about the problems of the muslims and presumably that was not what Aung Suu Kyi was expecting since no one had bothered to tell her that the main topic of the interview would by the persecution of the muslim minority. No politician likes to go into an interview unprepared.
